Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1982...
Traded from Wisconsin to Pittsburgh on 7/21/1982 (Going to WIS: C J. Bustillos, CF G. Albino, P R. Gallegos. Going to PIT: RF J. Cardella, 2B A. Gies, P A. Zamora, C S. Nolan)...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1983, off Wally Flanagan (BC)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/5/1983, off Gil Chavez (SHP)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1986...
